1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Term picker is a data for picking target terms
4--   based on input heading terms.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Rel.TermPicker
7  ( -- * Construct
8    TermPicker,
9    TermPick,
10    TermPick2,
11    termPicker,
12
13    -- * Presend & new terms
14    preTerms, newTerms, 
15    preTermsExist, newTermsExist,
16
17    -- * Mapping
18    termsIndex,
19    pickDirect,
20    pickTerms, cutTerms,
21    forwardTerms, backwardTerms, towardTerms,
22
23    -- * Double mapping
24    pickTerms2, cutTerms2,
25    forwardTerms2, backwardTerms2,
26  ) where
27
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture              as O
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                as S
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Judge            as D
32
33
34-- ============================================  Construct
35
36-- | Data for picking shared and proper terms.
37type TermPicker c = B.Picker S.TermName c
38
39-- | Type for picking terms.
40type TermPick c = TermPicker c -> [c] -> [c]
41
42-- | Double picker.
43type TermPick2 a b = (TermPick a, TermPick b)
44
45-- | Create term picker from left and right term names
46termPicker :: (D.GetTermNames target, D.GetTermNames input)
47           => target -> input -> TermPicker c
48termPicker target input =
49    B.picker (D.getTermNamesUnique target)
50             (D.getTermNamesUnique input)
51
52
53-- ============================================  Present & new terms
54
55-- | List of present terms.
56--   The first argument of 'termPicker' is treated as target terms,
57--   and the second is terms of input heading.
58--   Because firstly target terms are given to relmap operator,
59--   secondly input heading is fixed.
60--
61--   >>> preTerms $ termPicker "/a /b /c" "/a /b /d /e"
62--   [TermName EQ "a",TermName EQ "b"]
63--
64preTerms :: TermPicker c -> [S.TermName]
65preTerms = B.pkLShareNames
66
67-- | List of new terms.
68--
69--   >>> newTerms $ termPicker "/a /b /c" "/a /b /d /e"
70--   [TermName EQ "c"]
71--
72newTerms :: TermPicker c -> [S.TermName]
73newTerms = B.pkLProperNames
74
75-- | Test present terms exist.
76--
77--   >>> preTermsExist $ termPicker "/d /e" "/a /b /c"
78--   False
79--
80--   >>> preTermsExist $ termPicker "/c /d /e" "/a /b /c"
81--   True
82--
83preTermsExist :: O.Test (TermPicker c)
84preTermsExist = B.notNull . preTerms
85
86-- | Test new terms exist.
87--
88--   >>> newTermsExist $ termPicker "/a /b /c" "/a /b /d /e"
89--   True
90--
91--   >>> newTermsExist $ termPicker "/a /b" "/a /b /d /e"
92--   False
93--
94newTermsExist :: O.Test (TermPicker c)
95newTermsExist = B.notNull . newTerms
96
97
98--  ============================================  Mapping
99
100-- | Indices of target terms on input terms.
101--
102--   >>> termsIndex $ termPicker "/b /d" "/a /b /c /d"
103--   [1,3]
104--
105termsIndex :: TermPicker c -> [Int]
106termsIndex = B.pkRShareIndex
107
108-- | Pick contents of target terms.
109--
110--   >>> pickDirect "/b /d" "/a /b /c /d" "ABCD"
111--   "BD"
112--
113pickDirect :: (D.GetTermNames target, D.GetTermNames input)
114           => target -> input -> O.Map [c]
115pickDirect target input = pickTerms $ termPicker target input
116
117-- | Pick target terms from input terms.
118--
119--   >>> pickTerms (termPicker "/b /d" "/a /b /c /d") "ABCD"
120--   "BD"
121--
122pickTerms :: TermPick c
123pickTerms = B.pkRShare
124
125-- | Cut target terms from input terms.
126--
127--   >>> cutTerms (termPicker "/b /d" "/a /b /c /d") "ABCD"
128--   "AC"
129--
130cutTerms :: TermPick c
131cutTerms = B.pkRProper
132
133-- | Move target terms forward.
134--
135--   >>> forwardTerms (termPicker "/b /d" "/a /b /c /d") "ABCD"
136--   "BDAC"
137--
138forwardTerms :: TermPick c
139forwardTerms = B.pkRForward
140
141-- | Move target terms backward.
142--
143--   >>> backwardTerms (termPicker "/b /d" "/a /b /c /d") "ABCD"
144--   "ACBD"
145--
146backwardTerms :: TermPick c
147backwardTerms = B.pkRBackward
148
149-- | Move target terms forward if 'True' or backward if 'False'.
150towardTerms :: Bool -> TermPick c
151towardTerms True  = forwardTerms
152towardTerms False = backwardTerms
153
154
155--  ============================================  Double mapping
156
157-- | Double 'pickTerms'.
158pickTerms2 :: TermPick2 a b
159pickTerms2 = (pickTerms, pickTerms)
160
161-- | Double 'cutTerms'.
162cutTerms2 :: TermPick2 a b
163cutTerms2 = (cutTerms, cutTerms)
164
165-- | Double 'forwardTerms'.
166forwardTerms2 :: TermPick2 a b
167forwardTerms2 = (forwardTerms, forwardTerms)
168
169-- | Double 'backwardTerms'.
170backwardTerms2 :: TermPick2 a b
171backwardTerms2 = (backwardTerms, backwardTerms)
172
